data.Sentence_cn: 课文48  规划股份投资
data.Sentence: --- Lesson 48 Planning a share portfolio

data.Sentence_cn: 年长的投资者和年轻的投资者在投资方法上有什么不同?
data.Sentence: How does the older investor differ in his approach to investment from the younger investor?

data.Sentence_cn: 我们周围不乏情报贩子，向人们提供迅速发财致富的机遇。
data.Sentence: There is no shortage of tipsters around offering 'get-rich-quick' opportunities.

data.Sentence_cn: 但是，如果你是一个认真的私人投资者，就把拉斯韦加斯的心态留给那些有钱可供挥霍的人。
data.Sentence: But if you are a serious private investor, leave the Las Vegas mentality to those with money to fritter.

data.Sentence_cn: 认真的投资者需要一份正规的投资组合表 -- 一种计划很周密的投资选择，包括你的投资结构和明确的目标。
data.Sentence: The serious investor needs a proper 'portfolio' --a well-planned selection of investments, with a definite structure and a clear aim.

data.Sentence_cn: 但是, 一个股票市场的新手又如何能做到这一点呢？
data.Sentence: But exactly how does a newcomer to the stock market go about achieving that?

data.Sentence_cn: 如果你去向5位有威望的股票经纪人咨询，询问你应该如何使用你的资金，
data.Sentence: Well, if you go to five reputable stock brokers and ask them what you should do with your money,

data.Sentence_cn: 你可能得到5种不同的答复，
data.Sentence: you're likely to get five different answers,

data.Sentence_cn: 即便你提供了有关于你的年龄、家庭、财源和你想从投资中获得好处的信息。
data.Sentence: --  even if you give all the relevant information about your age, family, finances and what you want from your investments.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是个道德问题吗？没有一种完全“正确”的方法来排列这种投资组合，
data.Sentence: Moral? There is no one 'right' way to structure a portfolio.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而，却毫无疑问地有几种错误的方法。可以相信5位经纪人中不会有人
data.Sentence: However, there are undoubtedly some wrong ways, and you can be sure that none of our five advisers

data.Sentence_cn: 建议你把全部（或一部份）资金投入佩里威格斯公司。
data.Sentence: would have suggested sinking all (or perhaps any) of your money into Periwigs.

data.Sentence_cn: 那么你该怎么做呢？
data.Sentence: So what should you do?

data.Sentence_cn: 我们假定你已把基本情况弄清楚了，如抵押贷款、养老金、保险金和动用现金储备的机会。
data.Sentence: We'll assume that you have sorted out the basics -- like mortgages, pensions, insurance and access to sufficient cash reserves.

data.Sentence_cn: 然后，你一定要建立起自己的目标。
data.Sentence: You should then establish your own individual aims.

data.Sentence_cn: 这里一方面是个所处的环境，另一方面是个心理学的问题。
data.Sentence: These are partly a matter of personal circumstances, partly a matter of psychology.

data.Sentence_cn: 比如说，如果你年纪较大，你从重大投资损失中恢复过来的时间就较少，你就很希望能够提高你的养老金收入。
data.Sentence: For instance, if you are older you have less time to recover from any major losses, and you may well wish to boost your pension income.

data.Sentence_cn: 因此，你的首要任务就是保护你的资金和引发额外的收入。
data.Sentence: So preserving your capital and generating extra income are your main priorities.

data.Sentence_cn: 在这种情况下，你大概想制定一份包括某些股份（但不是风险很大的股份）的投资组合，同时还有高度可靠的证券、现金储蓄，
data.Sentence: In this case, you'd probably construct a portfolio with some shares (but not high risk ones), along with gilts, cash deposits,

data.Sentence_cn: 可能还有可换证券，或分割资本投资信托公司的所得股。
data.Sentence: and perhaps convertibles or the income shares of split capital investment trusts.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果你年轻一些，并且经济状况可靠，
data.Sentence: If you are younger, and in a solid financial position,

data.Sentence_cn: 你可能会采取一种积极进取的方式，你必须性格开朗，不会因股票价格的浮动而夜不能眠。
data.Sentence: you may decide to take an aggressive approach -- but only if you're blessed with a sanguine disposition and won't suffer sleepless nights over share prices.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果你觉得你的情况是这样的话，
data.Sentence: If you recognize yourself in this description,

data.Sentence_cn: 你可在投资组合中包括几项有令人陶醉的增值前景的增长股，和其他比较平淡的投资项目放在一起。
data.Sentence: you might include a couple of heady growth stocks in your portfolio, alongside your more pedestrian investments.

data.Sentence_cn: 一旦你的投资目标确立以后，你就可以决定你的钱投向何处。
data.Sentence: Once you have decided on your investment aims you can then decide where to put your money.

data.Sentence_cn: 这里的指导原则是：分散你的投资风险。如果你把所有资金投入佩里威格斯国际公司，
data.Sentence: The golden rule here is spread your risk -- if you put all of your money into Periwigs International,

data.Sentence_cn: 你就把自己当成了命运的人质。
data.Sentence: you're setting yourself up as a hostage to fortune.
